requiredFields.title: Jun sikte obligatorios
requiredFields.description: Much rellene tuláakal le sikte obligatorios.

First verify if this request is expected: Yáax verifique wa le solicitud esperada yéetel válida yéetel, wa táan seguro, beetik clic ti' URL utia'al proceder yéetel u bo'ol.
